name: Packet Delivery
description:
Packet Delivery

Packet Delivery is a platformer game with one determining restriction during its development, the player cannot have any method to interact directly with the character's movement, in this case, the packet. The main reference to create this game has been "The Impossible Game" and "Geometry Dash".

This game prototype was developed as a little practice.

Developed in 2018.

For a better experience, I recommend playing the game windowed, as the approach was similar to other mobile games.

No artist was involved :)

How to play:

- You only need to move your mouse and click on the interactive elements!
